name: Ratfolk
movement: slow with a walk speed of 10 feet
description: The Ratfolk is a small humanoid creature known for its agility and cunning nature, wearing studded leather armor.
memorable: Its ability to evade and navigate through larger foes makes it a challenging opponent.
goals: To leverage teamwork and terrain to outmaneuver adversaries.
relations: Often found in groups or packs, coordinating with allies for combat advantages.
environment: Typically an underground or urban setting, favoring dark and cramped spaces.
strengths: Excels in agility and teamwork, able to gain advantage in combat when allies are nearby.
weaknesses: Physically weak with low strength and limited movement speed.
attacks: Uses daggers or light crossbows to deal piercing damage at range or in melee.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics grants an advantage on attack rolls when allies are around.
equipment: Studded leather armor and a dagger or light crossbow.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light and darkness.
skills: Good at noticing hidden threats due to a +2 modifier in Perception.
additional_information: Can move through the space of larger enemies with no hindrance.
Often seen as a sly opportunist rather than a malevolent creature.
Low strength score results in a very bad physical power output.
Works well in groups, taking advantage of its allies' positions.
Possesses decent intelligence for strategic planning.
test_queries: cunning ratfolk that uses teamwork in combat
nimble creature that moves through enemies
